name: Grey goo (itch) (Willbl3pic)
description:
Requires Firefox > 61 or Chrome > 63 due to WebGL 2!

The grey goo devours everything, taking up more and more space! Find the killswitch and use it!

A first-person game where you must navigate through a labyrinth to find your objective, while avoiding the ever-growing grey goo.

Controls:
  • Left arrow/A and right arrow/D to turn
  • Up arrow/W and down arrow/S to move
Inspirations:
  • the [grey goo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grey_goo) end-of-the-world scenario
  • that Windows 95 maze screensaver
  • DOOM
Made using:
  • Unity (including standard post-processing stack)
  • Krita
  • Audacity
  • Blender
